Package com.amazon.ion

Interface IonTextReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Faceted, IonReader
    @Deprecated
public interface IonTextReader
extends IonReader
    Deprecated.
    Use TextSpan instead.
    Extends IonReader with capabilites specialized to Ion text data streams.
    See Also:
    SpanProvider, TextSpan, Spans.currentSpan(Class, Object)
